alert.note: Alert for Allen; Cass; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Wabash; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:45PM EDT until March 31 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Wabash County in north central Indiana... Northwestern Grant County in central Indiana... Huntington County in northeastern Indiana... North central Wells County in northeastern Indiana... Southeastern Cass County in north central Indiana... Southeastern Miami County in north central Indiana... * Until 1130 PM EDT. * At 1044 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of North Manchester to 6 miles southeast of Peru to 6 miles south of Walton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntington, Wabash, Grissom Afb, Andrews, Markle, Bunker Hill, La Fontaine, Lincoln, Roanoke, Galveston, Miami, Converse, Warren, Lancaster, Zanesville, Erie, Roann, Lagro, Amboy and Mount Etna. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 near mile marker 3, and between mile markers 7 and 8. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 274 and 297. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central, north central and northeastern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central, north central and northeastern Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Cass; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Wabash; Wells
